Package prkmodel.types

Interface Neuron

All Superinterfaces:
NervousSystemElement
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultNeuron, RepastNeuron
public interface Neuron extends NervousSystemElement
Interface representing a neuron in the nervous system. It extends the NervousSystemElement interface to include neuron-specific behaviors and properties.
Since:
2024-07-03
Version:
1.0
Author:
Samuele95
See Also:
  • NervousSystemElement
  • NeuronState
  • NeuronNetwork
  • ModelElementType
  • NeuronGuestElement

    • generateGuestElement

      Optional<NeuronGuestElement> generateGuestElement(ModelElementType elementType, double probability)
      Generates a guest element of a specified type with a given probability.
      Parameters:
      elementType - the type of the guest element to generate.
      probability - the probability of generating the guest element.
      Returns:
      an optional containing the generated guest element if successful, otherwise an empty optional.
